backend/main.mo: Actor storing contact form submissions in a map with add, list, and lookup functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing descriptive summaries for various frontend components and pages.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide outlining theme checks, routes, assets, and pre‑launch verification steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining CSS variables for themes and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document setting metadata and loading the React application root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React entry that configures TanStack Router routes and provides the router.
frontend/src/components/common/Container: Reusable layout wrapper applying consistent max‑width and horizontal padding.
frontend/src/components/common/GradientB: Transparent structural wrapper component retaining layout spacing without gradients.
Card component supporting titles, descriptions, icons, and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/common/OceanAnim: Renders static and animated ocean background layers plus a readability overlay.
frontend/src/components/common/ProfilePo: Displays a portrait image with gradient border, glow effect, and size options.
frontend/src/components/common/RightSide: Empty placeholder file for a portrait component.
frontend/src/components/common/SectionCo: Empty placeholder file for a portrait component.
frontend/src/components/common/SectionMe: Empty placeholder file for a portrait component.
frontend/src/components/common/ShareSite: Card that shows the site URL and provides copy‑to‑clipboard and open‑link actions.
frontend/src/components/common/Waterfall: Empty placeholder file for a video background component.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Contact form with validation, input handling, and backend submission via custom hook.
frontend/src/components/contact/SubmitSt: Displays success or error alerts after a form submission based on status props.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Renders the homepage hero with name, tagline, description, and call‑to‑action buttons.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Provides responsive site navigation with desktop links and a mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Shows footer with branding, quick links, contact prompt, and copyright info.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps the site with header, footer, animated background, and routed content outlet.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Projec: Offers tab-based filtering UI to select project categories.
Displays project cards with descriptions, tools, and optional external links.
frontend/src/components/skills/SkillCate: Renders a skill category card containing a list of skill meters.
frontend/src/components/skills/SkillMete: Shows a labeled progress bar representing a skill’s proficiency level.
frontend/src/components/skills/SkillsDet: Displays detailed skill sections with images, descriptions, and key areas.
frontend/src/data/projects.ts: Defines the Project interface and a list of categorized project entries.
frontend/src/data/skillsDetails.ts: Defines the SkillDetail interface and exports an array of detailed skill categories with images for multiple skill domains.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, including login, logout, identity loading, and status handling via AuthClient.
Defines a mutation hook that submits contact form data through the backend actor and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind styles, theme variables, dark mode colors, and animated ocean background layers.
frontend/src/lib/emailValidation.ts: Exports a simple email validation function using a basic regex pattern.
frontend/src/lib/portrait.ts: Defines centralized portrait image path and alt text with URL-encoded asset handling.
frontend/src/lib/seo.ts: Provides utilities to set document title and meta tags, including Open Graph metadata.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with SEO setup, portrait, highlights, and descriptive bio content.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the contact page with SEO setup, a contact form, and contact info cards within a gradient background.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Sets homepage SEO metadata and displays the main hero section.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Shows a filterable projects grid with SEO setup and a skills details section.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays a services list with SEO configuration and a CTA section.
frontend/src/pages/SkillsPage.tsx: Renders the skills details section with SEO setup and a styled header.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, requirements, design changes, issues, and assets for the portfolio site.
